txt.en: You did much to discourage the Wargs from dwelling in the hills of Râkh Mathán. Those who fight for Gondor will surely thank you for your efforts.
Mounds of hides and corpses of spiders can be found in Râkh Mathán in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should burn spider corpses and mounds of hides in Râkh Mathán.
Spider corpses and mounds of hides can be found in Râkh Mathán in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should burn spider corpses and mounds of hides in Râkh Mathán.
Burn spider corpses and mounds of hides in Râkh Mathán

The hillside at Râkh Mathán is home to many Wargs. Their dwellings are filled with filthy hides and the foul corpses of the spiders on which they gnaw. You decide that these mounds of hides and corpses should be burned to discourage the Wargs from dwelling still in Rath Dúath.
Burned spider corpses and mounds of hides in Râkh Mathán.
Warg dens litter the hills of the Rath Dúath, but the wargs are not alone. Orcs have bred and trained the beasts to follow their master's lash.
